General.Name: Nanyang Senba Optical and Electronic Co Ltd
General.Description: Senba Sensing Technology Co., Ltd. engages in the research and development, manufacture, and sale of photoelectric components in China. The company offers Pyroelectric Infrared, visible light, infrared flame sensor, and infrared thermopile temperature sensors; and linear optocouplers, optical filters, occupancy sensing module, Fresnel lens, and differential pressure sensor. Its components are used in smart home, smart lighting, security monitoring, fire detection, industrial control, negative pressure ambulance, square cabin hospital, and other fields. The company was formerly known as Nan Yang Senba Optical and Electronic Co.,Ltd. and changed its name to Senba Sensing Technology Co., Ltd. in April 2018. Senba Sensing Technology Co., Ltd. was founded in 2005 and is headquartered in Nanyang, China.
General.Address: Senba Sensing Industrial Park, Nanyang, China
